scripts.dev: concurrently 'cd ./client && npm run build-watch-dev' 'cd ./server && cargo run'
scripts.prepackage-debian-armv7: rm -rf ./build/debian-armv7 && mkdir -p ./build/ && cp -r ./config/debian ./build/debian-armv7 && npm run build-client && npm run build-server-armv7
scripts.prepackage-debian-aarch64: rm -rf ./build/debian-aarch64 && mkdir -p ./build/ && cp -r ./config/debian ./build/debian-aarch64 && npm run build-client && npm run build-server-aarch64
scripts.prepackage-linux: npm run build-client && cd server && cross build --target aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu --release
